Name: ExpoCad_Deck
skuid__Layout__c:
<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="yes" personalizationmode="server" showsidebar="true" useviewportmeta="true" showheader="true" theme="GE_Lightning">
    <models>
        <model id="EventEditionModal" limit="1" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="salesforce" type="" sobject="Event_Edition__c">
            <fields>
                <field id="Name"/>
                <field id="NewField" uionly="true" displaytype="PICKLIST" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" picklistsource="rowsinmodel" defaultvaluetype="modelmerge" defaultValue="" model="EventEditionModal" enclosevalueinquotes="true" mergefield="Name" picklistmodel="EventEditionModal">
                    <picklistentries/>
                </field>
                <field id="Id"/>
            </fields>
            <conditions>
                <condition type="param" value="Id" field="Id" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" novaluebehavior=""/>
            </conditions>
            <actions/>
        </model>
        <model id="QuoteLineitem_Modal" limit="20" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="salesforce" type="aggregate" sobject="SBQQ__QuoteLine__c">
            <fields>
                <field id="SBQQ__NetTotal__c" name="sumSBQQNetTotalc" function="SUM"/>
                <field id="SBQQ__Quantity__c" name="sumSBQQQuantityc" function="SUM"/>
                <field id="Yield" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" precision="9" scale="2" readonly="true" returntype="DOUBLE" label="Yield">
                    <formula>{{sumSBQQNetTotalc}}/{{sumSBQQQuantityc}}</formula>
                </field>
                <field id="Total Amount sold" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Total Amount sold" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" readonly="true" returntype="DOUBLE" precision="9" scale="2">
                    <formula>{{{sumSBQQNetTotalc}}}</formula>
                </field>
            </fields>
            <conditions>
                <condition type="param" value="Id" field="SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.EventEdition__c" fieldtargetobjects="Event_Edition__c" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" novaluebehavior=""/>
                <condition type="blank" value="null" field="Event_Product_Type__c" operator="!=" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
                <condition type="multiple" value="" field="SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.StageName" operator="in" enclosevalueinquotes="true">
                    <values>
                        <value>Closed Won</value>
                        <value>Closed Booked</value>
                    </values>
                </condition>
                <condition type="multiple" value="" field="Event_Product_Type__c" operator="not in" enclosevalueinquotes="true">
                    <values>
                        <value>Booth Cancellation</value>
                        <value>Digital</value>
                        <value>Premium</value>
                        <value>Publishing</value>
                        <value>Sponsorship</value>
                        <value>Other</value>
                    </values>
                </condition>
                <condition type="fieldvalue" value="Contract Approved" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__Status__c"/>
                <condition type="fieldvalue" value="Booth Package" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="SBQQ__Product__r.Name" operator="does not contain"/>
                <condition type="fieldvalue" value="Corner" enclosevalueinquotes="true" operator="does not contain" field="SBQQ__Product__r.Name"/>
            </conditions>
            <actions/>
            <groupby method="simple">
                <field id="SBQQ__Product__r.Name" name="sBQQProductrName"/>
                <field id="SBQQ__Product__r.Event_Product_Type__c" name="sBQQProductrEventProductT"/>
                <field id="CurrencyIsoCode" name="currencyIsoCode"/>
                <field id="SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.EventEdition__r.Measurement__c" name="sBQQQuoterSBQQOpportunity"/>
            </groupby>
        </model>
    </models>
    <components>
        <wrapper uniqueid="sk-2-Op-_-288">

var params = arguments[0], 
$ = skuid.$;
var NewOpportunity = skuid.model.getModel('NewOpportunity1');
var Opportunity = NewOpportunity.getFirstRow();
$.blockUI({message: 'Conversion is processed please wait for few second ...', timeout: 1000 });
var eventDetailModel = skuid.model.getModel('onlineboothcapture');
var eventDetail = eventDetailModel.getFirstRow();
var accountId= Opportunity.AccountId;
var OppName = Opportunity.Name;
var sobcId = eventDetail.Id;
var salesuser ;

if (typeof Opportunity.OwnerId !== 'undefined'){
    salesuser = Opportunity.OwnerId;
}
else {
    salesuser = skuid.utils.userInfo.userId;
}

var result = sforce.apex.execute('ReviewProcess_cls','reviewprocess', {OppName:OppName, accountId:accountId, sobcId:sobcId , salesuser:salesuser} , function(result){ 
  console.log('Result: '+result);
  var parsedResult = JSON.parse(result);
  console.log(parsedResult);
  window.location.href = '/' + parsedResult[0].sOppId;
});


</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="ExistingOppReviewProcess" cachelocation="false">/*
    Existing opportuntiy for review process information as per event edition as User 
*/
var params = arguments[0], 
$ = skuid.$;
$.blockUI({message: 'Conversion is processed please wait for few second ...', timeout: 1000 });
var OnlineBoothCaptureModal = skuid.model.getModel('onlineboothcapture');
var OnlineBooth = OnlineBoothCaptureModal.getFirstRow();
var isConverted = OnlineBooth.Isconvert__c;
console.log('isConverted' + isConverted);
if(isConverted === true){
    
    alert('This booth request already converted please choose another one');
}
else{
    
    var OppId = OnlineBooth.Opportunity__c;
    var sobcId = OnlineBooth.Id;
    var salesuser;
    
    if (typeof OnlineBooth.User__c !== 'undefined'){
        salesuser = OnlineBooth.User__c;
    }
    else {
        salesuser = skuid.utils.userInfo.userId;
    }
    
    var result = sforce.apex.execute('ExistingOppReviewProcess_cls','reviewprocess', {OppId:OppId, sobcId:sobcId , salesuser:salesuser} , function(result){ 
      console.log('Result: '+result);
      var parsedResult = JSON.parse(result);
      console.log(parsedResult);
      console.log(parsedResult[0].sOppId);
      window.location.href = '/' + parsedResult[0].sOppId;
    });
}

uniqueid="sk-3xib_e-2108" id="CheckBox_1__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type="" cssclass=""><label>We plan our works for build and break-down phases and adhere to the safety rules laid down in the information provided by the Organiser and the Venue</label></field><field uniqueid="sk-3xib_f-2109" id="CheckBox_2__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type=""><label>Stand and exhibit materials we install meet fire resistant standards with samples sent to Organiser</label></field><field uniqueid="sk-3xib_f-2110" id="CheckBox_3__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type=""><label>We keep emergency escape routes clear</label></field><field uniqueid="sk-3xib_f-2111" id="Check_Box_4__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type=""><label>We ensure that all persons will be able to leave our stand safely and can see where the exits are.</label></field><field uniqueid="sk-3xib_g-2112" id="Check_Box_5__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type=""><label>We observe the no smoking rules</label></field><field uniqueid="sk-3xib_g-2113" id="Check_Box_6__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type=""><label>We don't carry out hot-work unless we have written permission from the Organiser, subject to permit</label></field><field uniqueid="sk-3xib_g-2114" id="Check_Box_7__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type=""><label>We maintain good housekeeping and clear away rubbish regularly</label></field><field uniqueid="sk-3xib_h-2115" id="Check_Box_8__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type=""><label>We are vigilant and report any security concerns</label></field><field uniqueid="sk-3xib_h-2116" id="Check_Box_9__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type=""><label>When we have to work at height we use a stable working platform with proper edge protection or steps where the work is of short duration</label></field><field uniqueid="sk-3xib_h-2117" id="Check_Box_10__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type=""><label>We are careful to avoid items falling onto persons below</label></field><field uniqueid="sk-3xib_h-2118" id="Check_Box_11__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type=""><label>We take care to minimise trailing leads, covering or taping these down where feasible</label></field><field uniqueid="sk-3xib_i-2119" id="Check_Box_12__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type=""><label>Our staff wear safety footwear when build or dismantling stands</label></field><field uniqueid="sk-3xib_i-2120" id="Check_Box_13__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type=""><label>We have our own rules to ensure our staff use equipment safely</label></field><field uniqueid="sk-3xib_i-2121" id="Check_Box_14__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type=""><label>Our powertools are battery powered or run on 110V extra low voltage supplies</label></field><field uniqueid="sk-3xib_j-2122" id="Check_Box_15__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type=""><label>All our powertools are properly guarded and we continue to check this is the case</label></field><field uniqueid="sk-3xib_j-2123" id="Check_Box_16__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type=""><label>We supply pre-prepared and pre-cut materials for our stand before we come to site, whenever we can</label></field><field uniqueid="sk-3xib_j-2124" id="Check_Box_17__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type=""><label>When we do have to cut wood materials we use extraction uniqueid="Responsive"><divisions><division behavior="specified" verticalalign="center" width="100%" uniqueid="TopHeader" cssclass="MainCSS"><components><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3tuMbs-800" cssclass="backGroundColor"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3tt4bh-446" cssclass="FormTitle templateFontWeight "><contents><b>SPACE ONLY STAND FITTING REGULATIONS</b>
</contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/><styleitem type="border" padding="bottom,"><styles><styleitem property="padding-bottom" value="30px"/><styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/></styles></styleitem><styleitem type="size"/></styles></wrapper><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3c0ugH-330" model="EventEditionForm" allowhtml="true" cssclass="TemplateBackground Description templateFontWeight"><contents>Please ensure that Space Only Stand Exhibitors and Contractors read the below information with careful consideration. To confirm that you have read the below information and agree to adhere to the Space Only Stand Fitting Regulations, please complete the necessary fields and submit. When you click submit, this will be sent to {{Operation_Admin_1__c}} and {{Operation_Admin_2__c}}.
</br>
</br>
Please submit the Space Only Stand Fitting Regulations by {{Deadline__c}}
</br>
</br>
Please note, Exhibitors will only be provided with Permission to Build once {{Operation_Admin_1__c}} have received a complete Risk Assessment, Method Statement, Stand Contractor Form and Stand Plans Form. 
</br>
</br>
Please note that this form must be completed by Space Only Exhibitors Only</contents><renderconditions logictype="and"/></template></components></division><division behavior="specified" verticalalign="top" width="100%"><components><basicfieldeditor showheader="true" showsavecancel="false" showerrorsinline="true" model="FormData" buttonposition="" uniqueid="sk-3JfUqE-358" mode="edit" layout="" cssclass="fieldEditorColor"><columns layoutmode="fixed"><column width="51%"><sections><section title="{{$Label.Exhibition_Details}}:" collapsible="no"><fields><field id="Name" valuehalign="" type="" uniqueid="sk-1xQ1iv-94" required="true"><label>Exhibition Company:</label><renderconditions logictype="and" onhidedatabehavior="keep"/><enableconditions/></field><field uniqueid="sk-3w71J4-490" id="Full_Name__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type="" required="true"/><field id="Hall_No__c" uniqueid="sk-1xQ1ix-96" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type="" required="true"><label>Stand Number</label></field><field uniqueid="sk-3cJp4Y-550" id="Direct_No__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type="" required="true"><label>Site Telephone Number:</label></field><field uniqueid="sk-3cJueU-570" id="Email__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type="" readonly="false" required="true"/><field uniqueid="sk-3cJ_Gx-595" id="Declaration_Authorised_By__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type="" required="true"/><field uniqueid="sk-3cK1IC-608" id="Position__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type="" required="true"/></fields><renderconditions logictype="and"/></section></sections></column><column width="50%"><sections/><renderconditions logictype="and"/></column><column width="51%"><sections><section title="Individual from Exhibiting Company with Overall Responsibility for Health &amp; Safety on Site:" collapsible="no"><fields><field uniqueid="sk-3cKjzP-640" id="Contact_Name__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type="" required="true"><label>Name:</label></field><field uniqueid="sk-3cKjzP-641" id="Contact_Position__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type="" required="true"><label>Position:</label></field><field uniqueid="sk-3cKjzQ-642" id="Contact_Mobile_Number__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type="" required="true"><label>Mobile Number:</label></field><field uniqueid="sk-3uBXIE-754" id="Contact_Email__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type="" required="true"><label>Email:</label></field></fields></section></sections></column></columns><renderconditions logictype="and"/></basicfieldeditor></components></division><division behavior="specified" verticalalign="top" width="100%" uniqueid="SecondHeader" cssclass="MainCSS "><components><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3uB0y6-655"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3uAqZI-615" allowhtml="true"><contents><hr></contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background"/><styleitem type="border" padding="bottom,"><styles><styleitem property="padding-bottom" value="40px"/><styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/></styles></styleitem><styleitem type="size"/></styles></wrapper><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3tw4Zn-1051" cssclass=""><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wNl4O-625" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight"><contents><b>GENERAL</b></contents></template><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3wNurj-654"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wNxW3-662" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight"><contents><ul>
<li>It is the responsibility of Space Only Exhibitors to examine the site allocated to you to avoid costly adjustments to stand structures on site as minor obstructions or reduced headroom (for which the Organisers can accept no responsibility) cannot always be indicated on the Exhibition floorplan</li>
<li>If you have booked a Space Only stand it is your responsibility to design and construct your own stand - you will receive no items (walling, stand fitting, flooring etc.) from the Organisers
</li>
<li>You may use a Contractor of your choice for the design and construction of Space Only stands however the Organisers must give final approval to any Contractors appointed by Exhibitors before they commence building on site
</li>
<li>It is the responsibility of the Exhibitor to ensure their Contractors are properly accredited with regards to health & safety, workmanship, service and business practice.  It is also the responsibility of the Exhibitor to ensure that their Contractors adhere to all the rules and regulations stipulated in the Exhibitor Manual
</li>
<li>It is the responsibility of the Exhibitor to ensure their Contractors are properly accredited with regards to health & safety, workmanship, service and business practice.  It is also the responsibility of the Exhibitor to ensure that their Contractors adhere to all the rules and regulations stipulated in the Exhibitor Manual
</li>
</ul></contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background"/><styleitem type="border" padding="bottom,left,"><styles><styleitem property="padding-left" value="20px"/><styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/></styles></styleitem><styleitem type="size"/></styles></wrapper><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wOh34-810" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight"><contents><b>STAND CONSTRUCTION </b></contents></template><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3wP4jS-917"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wPAXo-943" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight" model="EventEditionForm"><contents><ul>
  <li>The maximum build height of stand fitting for stands is 4m from floor level. Construction over this height is not permitted</li>
  <li>The minimum height for dividing walls is  {{Minimum_Stand_Height__c}} and the maximum is 4m.</li>
  <li>Double Deck stands are not permitted</li>
</ul></contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background"/><styleitem type="border" padding="left,"><styles><styleitem property="padding-left" value="20px"/><styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/></styles></styleitem><styleitem type="size"/></styles></wrapper><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wPNW6-994" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight"><contents><b>Regulations</b></contents></template><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3wPSxe-1015"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wPVIP-1033" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight" model="EventEditionForm"><contents><ul>
  <li>All stands are required to be structurally stable and self-supporting.  Fixing to the fabric of the venue is not permitted</li>
  <li>All stands must provide a wall as a dividing line with your neighbouring stands.  This minimum wall height is  {{Minimum_Stand_Height__c}} and the maximum is 4m</li>
  <li>Stands that neighbour Shell Scheme stands are not permitted to attach any materials to the Shell Scheme and must deduct 55mm from the overall stand measurements to ensure they fit within the allotted space</li>
  <li>All stand construction and displays must be made from fireproofed materials and installed to the satisfaction of the authorities</li>
  <li>All electrical installations must be carried out by the official contractor.</li>
  <li>The corners of raised floors on stands must be splayed, rounded or angled to prevent sharp corners and tripping hazards</li>
  <li>All carpet tape must be removed and any charges for the removal of remaining carpet tape at the end of Breakdown will be charged directly to the Exhibitor </li>
  <li>The required minimum effective clear width of a door is 800mm. All doors should be provided with a vision panel of clear glazing giving a zone of visibility from 900mm to 1500mm above floor level to enable fire detection.  Doors facing gangways must always open inwards</li>
  <li>Stands that incorporate a raised platform floor of 60mm and above are required to include a ramp for ease of access</li>
  <li>Any stand requiring piped services must provide a platform floor of at least 100mm from floor level to hide the pipes</li>
  <li>All timber construction must be pre-fabricated.  The cutting of construction materials onsite must be kept to a minimum</li>
</ul> </contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background"/><styleitem type="border" padding="left,"><styles><styleitem property="padding-left" value="20px"/><styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/></styles></styleitem><styleitem type="size"/></styles></wrapper><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wT1Gr-1247" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight"><contents><b>WALLING</b></contents></template><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3wT66q-1266"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wT705-1277" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight" model="EventEditionForm"><contents><ul>
  <li>Long runs of solid walling must be avoided along sides open to gangways. No more than a maximum of 50% of any open side to a gangway can be constructed with solid wall panels</li>
  <li>Walls above  {{Minimum_Stand_Height__c}} high which overlook adjoining stands must be finished neatly to the satisfaction of the Organisers in a plain and neutral colour with no advertising or branding</li>
  <li>Wall panels that face open gangways must be decorated with display graphics and not be left plain</li>
</ul> </contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background"/><styleitem type="border" padding="left,"><styles><styleitem property="padding-left" value="20px"/><styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/></styles></styleitem><styleitem type="size"/></styles></wrapper><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wTa8c-1338" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight"><contents><b>BRIDGING ACROSS GANGWAYS</b></contents></template><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3wTeRw-1357"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wTfMN-1368" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight" model="EventEditionForm"><contents><ul>
  <li>Bridging across gangways will only be permitted after stand build plans have been submitted and approved by {{Operation_Admin_1__c}} and the venue</li>
  <li>Additional signage to designated emergency exit points may be required when bridging over mandatory gangways</li>
  <li>The gangway must remain free of obstructions and be clearly identified at floor level by means of a variance in colour or shade of flooring</li>
</ul> </contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background"/><styleitem type="border" padding="left,"><styles><styleitem property="padding-left" value="20px"/><styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/></styles></styleitem><styleitem type="size"/></styles></wrapper><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wT_d9-1435" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight"><contents><b>RIGGING</b></contents></template><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3wU39O-1453"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wU404-1464" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight" model="EventEditionForm"><contents><ul>
  <li>All proposed rigging must be included in your proposed stand design and approved in advance by {{Operation_Admin_1__c}} and the venue</li>
  <li>The fixing of all primary rigging points must be carried out by the venue</li>
  <li>Rigging of any structures other than lighting or lightweight banners with aluminium frame is classed as complex and structural calculations are required. This will be subject to a fixed fee of 275 + VAT (without exception) for a pre-show and onsite structural engineer check</li>
  <li>The maximum height for the top of a truss or rigging fixings is 8m from floor level</li>
</ul> </contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background"/><styleitem type="border" padding="left,"><styles><styleitem property="padding-left" value="20px"/><styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/></styles></styleitem><styleitem type="size"/></styles></wrapper><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wUIlh-1535" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight"><contents><b>MACHINERY EXHIBITS</b></contents></template><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3wUO0M-1554"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wUOZD-1565" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight"><contents><ul>
  <li>Working machinery exhibits must be suitably guarded and set back a minimum of 0.5m from any open side of the stand.  Compliance with this is mandatory</li>
</ul></contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background"/><styleitem type="border" padding="left,"><styles><styleitem property="padding-left" value="20px"/><styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/></styles></styleitem><styleitem type="size"/></styles></wrapper><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wUXzA-1616" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight"><contents><b>SPACE ONLY STAND AGREMENT</b></contents></template><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3wUmIg-1661"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wUe8h-1641" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight" model="EventEditionForm"><contents>All Space Only Exhibitors must complete and submit the following by {{Deadline__c}} to  {{Operation_Admin_1__c}}: {{Operation_Admin_1_Email__c}}</contents></template><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3wUsEV-1686"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wUtAE-1696" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight"><contents><ul>
  <li>Exhibitors undertake to construct a stand that is in keeping with the reputation of TOC Events Worldwide.  Should a stand, in the opinion of the Organisers, fail to be of a quality that is in keeping with the event then the Organisers have the authority to carry out any actions applicable and any additional costs or expenses are to be borne by the Exhibitor.</li>
  <li>A full set of plans in English showing all dimension to a clearly recognised scale, with side elevations, front elevation and plan view</li>
  <li>Plans should also show the position of machinery exhibits</li>
  <li>A signed copied of this Space Only Stand Fitting Regulations Agreement including contractor details</li>
  <li>Risk assessment for the build and breakdown periods and a risk assessment for the open period</li>
  <li>Method statement (including details of rigging if applicable and details of any machinery if applicable)</li>
  <li>Health & safety declaration</li>
  <li>Structural calculations (for complex stands only)</li>
</ul></contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background"/><styleitem type="border" padding="bottom,"><styles><styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/></styles></styleitem><styleitem type="size"/></styles></wrapper><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wVLDU-1825" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight" model="EventEditionForm"><contents>All forms can be found online in the Exhibitor Manual. Stand plans should be submitted to {{Operation_Admin_1__c}} on E: {{Operation_Admin_1_Email__c}} or using the form in the Exhibitor Manual.</contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background"/><styleitem type="border" padding="bottom,top,"><styles><styleitem property="padding-top" value="20px"/><styleitem property="padding-bottom" value="0px"/><styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/></styles></styleitem><styleitem type="size"/></styles></wrapper><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wW2Cs-1872" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight"><contents><b>SPACE ONLY CONTRACTOR CONTACT INFORMATION AND AGREEMENT:</b></contents></template><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3wW9Cv-1894"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wWDsa-1920" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight" model="EventEditionForm"><contents>By signing this document, you are agreeing to adhere to the stand fitting regulations and confirm that you will abide by all regulations and carry out best practice at {{Event_Edition__c}} to make it a sustainable exhibition.</contents></template><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3wWH1U-1935"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wWJ46-1953" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight" model="EventEditionForm"><contents><ul>
  <li>Staff will wear sufficient personal protective equipment (PPE) during build up and breakdown</li>
  <li>If complex fees are applicable payment will be made in advance by the Exhibitor before the stand is approved</li>
  <li>The stand will arrive prefabricated where possible and any machine based carpentry must be detailed in the method statement</li>
  <li>The stand will be removed from the Exhibition Hall before {{Stand_Removal_Date_Time__c}}</li>
</ul>  
</contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background"/><styleitem type="border" padding="left,"><styles><styleitem property="padding-left" value="20px"/><styleitem </contents><renderconditions logictype="and"><rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" fieldmodel="UserFormActionModel" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" field="Status__c" value="Approved"/></renderconditions></richtext><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3vyjLx-548"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3vyi8T-541" allowhtml="true" cssclass="FormTitle templateFontWeight"><contents><b>SPACE ONLY STAND FITTING REGULATIONS</b>
</contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background"/><styleitem type="border" padding="bottom,"><styles><styleitem property="padding-bottom" value="30px"/><styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/></styles></styleitem><styleitem type="size"/></styles></wrapper><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3cNV6z-1004" allowhtml="true" model="EventEditionForm" cssclass="TemplateBackground Description templateFontWeight"><contents>Please ensure that Space Only Stand Exhibitors and Contractors read the below information with careful consideration. To confirm that you have read the below information and agree to adhere to the Space Only Stand Fitting Regulations, please complete the necessary fields and submit. When you click submit, this will be sent to {{Operation_Admin_1__c}} and {{Operation_Admin_2__c}}.
</br>
</br>
Please submit the Space Only Stand Fitting Regulations by {{Deadline__c}}
</br>
</br>
Please note, Exhibitors will only be provided with Permission to Build once {{Operation_Admin_1__c}} have received a complete Risk Assessment, Method Statement, Stand Contractor Form and Stand Plans Form. 
</br>
</br>
Please note that this form must be completed by Space Only Exhibitors Only</contents></template></components></division><division behavior="specified" verticalalign="top" width="100%"><components><basicfieldeditor showheader="true" showsavecancel="false" showerrorsinline="true" model="FormData" buttonposition="" uniqueid="sk-3JfUqE-358" mode="readonly" layout="" cssclass="fieldEditorColor"><columns layoutmode="fixed"><column width="50%"><sections><section title="Exhibition Details:" collapsible="no"><fields><field id="Name" valuehalign="" type="" uniqueid="sk-1xQ1kS-159"><label>Exhibition Name</label></field><field uniqueid="sk-3w77fh-538" id="Full_Name__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type=""/><field id="Hall_No__c" uniqueid="sk-1xQ1kU-161" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type=""><label>Stand Number</label></field><field uniqueid="sk-3cNkOQ-1081" id="Direct_No__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type=""><label>Site Number</label></field><field uniqueid="sk-3cNoGF-1101" id="Email__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type=""/><field uniqueid="sk-3cNp-l-1105" id="Declaration_Authorised_By__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type=""/><field uniqueid="sk-3cNs7N-1112" id="Position__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type=""/></fields><renderconditions logictype="and"/></section><section title="Individual from Exhibiting Company with Overall Responsibility for Health &amp; Safety on Site:" collapsible="no"><fields><field uniqueid="sk-3cNypN-1144" id="Contact_Name__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type=""><label>Name</label></field><field uniqueid="sk-3cNypN-1145" id="Contact_Position__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type=""><label>Position</label></field><field uniqueid="sk-3cNypN-1146" id="Contact_Mobile_Number__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type=""><label>Mobile Number</label></field><field uniqueid="sk-3cNypO-1147" id="Contact_Email__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type=""><label>Email</label></field></fields></section></sections></column><column width="50%"><sections><section title="New Section" collapsible="no" showheader="false"><fields/></section></sections></column></columns><renderconditions logictype="and"/></basicfieldeditor></components></division><division behavior="specified" verticalalign="top" width="100%" uniqueid="SecondHeader" cssclass="MainCSS"><components><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3vz16I-602"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3vz2Sf-613" allowhtml="true"><contents><hr></contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background"/><styleitem type="border" padding="bottom,"><styles><styleitem property="padding-bottom" value="40px"/><styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/></styles></styleitem><styleitem type="size"/></styles></wrapper><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3vzCJd-639" cssclass=""><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wXstT-2091" cssclass="templateFontWeight"><contents><b>GENERAL</b></contents></template><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3wXvz0-2101"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wXyC1-2118" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight" model="EventEditionForm"><contents><ul>
<li>It is the responsibility of Space Only Exhibitors to examine the site allocated to you to avoid costly adjustments to stand structures on site as minor obstructions or reduced headroom (for which the Organisers can accept no responsibility) cannot always be indicated on the Exhibition floorplan</li>
<li>If you have booked a Space Only stand it is your responsibility to design and construct your own stand - you will receive no items (walling, stand fitting, flooring etc.) from the Organisers
</li>
<li>You may use a Contractor of your choice for the design and construction of Space Only stands however the Organisers must give final approval to any Contractors appointed by Exhibitors before they commence building on site
</li>
<li>It is the responsibility of the Exhibitor to ensure their Contractors are properly accredited with regards to health & safety, workmanship, service and business practice.  It is also the responsibility of the Exhibitor to ensure that their Contractors adhere to all the rules and regulations stipulated in the Exhibitor Manual
</li>
<li>It is the responsibility of the Exhibitor to ensure their Contractors are properly accredited with regards to health & safety, workmanship, service and business practice.  It is also the responsibility of the Exhibitor to ensure that their Contractors adhere to all the rules and regulations stipulated in the Exhibitor Manual
</li>
</ul></contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background"/><styleitem type="border" padding="left,"><styles><styleitem property="padding-left" value="20px"/><styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/></styles></styleitem><styleitem type="size"/></styles></wrapper><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wX-HZ-2132" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight"><contents><b>STAND CONSTRUCTION </b></contents></template><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3wY1qb-2147"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wY3AT-2158" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight" model="EventEditionForm"><contents><ul>
  <li>The maximum build height of stand fitting for stands is 4m from floor level. Construction over this height is not permitted</li>
  <li>The minimum height for dividing walls is  {{Minimum_Stand_Height__c}} and the maximum is 4m.</li>
  <li>Double Deck stands are not permitted</li>
</ul></contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background"/><styleitem type="border" padding="left,"><styles><styleitem property="padding-left" value="20px"/><styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/></styles></styleitem><styleitem type="size"/></styles></wrapper><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wY6iy-2185" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight"><contents><b>Regulations</b></contents></template><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3wY8-w-2200"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wYAJS-2211" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight" model="EventEditionForm"><contents><ul>
  <li>All stands are required to be structurally stable and self-supporting.  Fixing to the fabric of the venue is not permitted</li>
  <li>All stands must provide a wall as a dividing line with your neighbouring stands.  This minimum wall height is  {{Minimum_Stand_Height__c}} and the maximum is 4m</li>
  <li>Stands that neighbour Shell Scheme stands are not permitted to attach any materials to the Shell Scheme and must deduct 55mm from the overall stand measurements to ensure they fit within the allotted space</li>
  <li>All stand construction and displays must be made from fireproofed materials and installed to the satisfaction of the authorities</li>
  <li>All electrical installations must be carried out by the official contractor.</li>
  <li>The corners of raised floors on stands must be splayed, rounded or angled to prevent sharp corners and tripping hazards</li>
  <li>All carpet tape must be removed and any charges for the removal of remaining carpet tape at the end of Breakdown will be charged directly to the Exhibitor </li>
  <li>The required minimum effective clear width of a door is 800mm. All doors should be provided with a vision panel of clear glazing giving a zone of visibility from 900mm to 1500mm above floor level to enable fire detection.  Doors facing gangways must always open inwards</li>
  <li>Stands that incorporate a raised platform floor of 60mm and above are required to include a ramp for ease of access</li>
  <li>Any stand requiring piped services must provide a platform floor of at least 100mm from floor level to hide the pipes</li>
  <li>All timber construction must be pre-fabricated.  The cutting of construction materials onsite must be kept to a minimum</li>
</ul> </contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background"/><styleitem type="border" padding="left,"><styles><styleitem property="padding-left" value="20px"/><styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/></styles></styleitem><styleitem type="size"/></styles></wrapper><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wYFz4-2237" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight"><contents><b>WALLING</b></contents></template><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3wYIk4-2254"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wYKsU-2272" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight" model="EventEditionForm"><contents><ul>
  <li>Long runs of solid walling must be avoided along sides open to gangways. No more than a maximum of 50% of any open side to a gangway can be constructed with solid wall panels</li>
  <li>Walls above  {{Minimum_Stand_Height__c}} high which overlook adjoining stands must be finished neatly to the satisfaction of the Organisers in a plain and neutral colour with no advertising or branding</li>
  <li>Wall panels that face open gangways must be decorated with display graphics and not be left plain</li>
</ul> </contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background"/><styleitem type="border" padding="left,"><styles><styleitem property="padding-left" value="20px"/><styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/></styles></styleitem><styleitem type="size"/></styles></wrapper><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wYTEy-2284" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight"><contents><b>BRIDGING ACROSS GANGWAYS</b></contents></template><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3wYWNO-2293"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wYaXO-2321" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight" model="EventEditionForm"><contents><ul>
  <li>Bridging across gangways will only be permitted after stand build plans have been submitted and approved by {{Operation_Admin_1__c}} and the venue</li>
  <li>Additional signage to designated emergency exit points may be required when bridging over mandatory gangways</li>
  <li>The gangway must remain free of obstructions and be clearly identified at floor level by means of a variance in colour or shade of flooring</li>
</ul> </contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background"/><styleitem type="border" padding="left,"><styles><styleitem property="padding-left" value="20px"/><styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/></styles></styleitem><styleitem type="size"/></styles></wrapper><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wa8su-2336" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight"><contents><b>RIGGING</b></contents></template><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3waZeI-2351"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wadSg-2369" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight" model="EventEditionForm"><contents><ul>
  <li>All proposed rigging must be included in your proposed stand design and approved in advance by {{Operation_Admin_1__c}} and the venue</li>
  <li>The fixing of all primary rigging points must be carried out by the venue</li>
  <li>Rigging of any structures other than lighting or lightweight banners with aluminium frame is classed as complex and structural calculations are required. This will be subject to a fixed fee of 275 + VAT (without exception) for a pre-show and onsite structural engineer check</li>
  <li>The maximum height for the top of a truss or rigging fixings is 8m from floor level</li>
</ul> </contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background"/><styleitem type="border" padding="left,"><styles><styleitem property="padding-left" value="20px"/><styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/></styles></styleitem><styleitem type="size"/></styles></wrapper><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wagV4-2384" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight"><contents><b>MACHINERY EXHIBITS</b></contents></template><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3wajL8-2401"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wal7g-2419" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight"><contents><ul>
  <li>Working machinery exhibits must be suitably guarded and set back a minimum of 0.5m from any open side of the stand.  Compliance with this is mandatory</li>
</ul></contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background"/><styleitem type="border" padding="left,"><styles><styleitem property="padding-left" value="20px"/><styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/></styles></styleitem><styleitem type="size"/></styles></wrapper><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wanlq-2434" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight"><contents><b>SPACE ONLY STAND AGREMENT</b></contents></template><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3waqDZ-2446"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wasAD-2467" cssclass="templateFontWeight" model="EventEditionForm"><contents>All Space Only Exhibitors must complete and submit the following by {{Deadline__c}} to  {{Operation_Admin_1__c}}: {{Operation_Admin_1_Email__c}}</contents></template><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3wazWW-2500"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wa-uh-2515" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight"><contents><ul>
  <li>Exhibitors undertake to construct a stand that is in keeping with the reputation of TOC Events Worldwide.  Should a stand, in the opinion of the Organisers, fail to be of a quality that is in keeping with the event then the Organisers have the authority to carry out any actions applicable and any additional costs or expenses are to be borne by the Exhibitor.</li>
  <li>A full set of plans in English showing all dimension to a clearly recognised scale, with side elevations, front elevation and plan view</li>
  <li>Plans should also show the position of machinery exhibits</li>
  <li>A signed copied of this Space Only Stand Fitting Regulations Agreement including contractor details</li>
  <li>Risk assessment for the build and breakdown periods and a risk assessment for the open period</li>
  <li>Method statement (including details of rigging if applicable and details of any machinery if applicable)</li>
  <li>Health & safety declaration</li>
  <li>Structural calculations (for complex stands only)</li>
</ul></contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background"/><styleitem type="border" padding="left,"><styles><styleitem property="padding-left" value="20px"/><styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/></styles></styleitem><styleitem type="size"/></styles></wrapper><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wb2QX-2530" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight" model="EventEditionForm"><contents>All forms can be found online in the Exhibitor Manual. Stand plans should be submitted to {{Operation_Admin_1__c}} on E: {{Operation_Admin_1_Email__c}} or using the form in the Exhibitor Manual.</contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background"/><styleitem type="border" padding="top,"><styles><styleitem property="padding-top" value="20px"/><styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/></styles></styleitem><styleitem type="size"/></styles></wrapper><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wb5oO-2545" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight"><contents><b>SPACE ONLY CONTRACTOR CONTACT INFORMATION AND AGREEMENT:</b></contents></template><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3wb8J2-2560"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wbCvU-2578" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight" model="EventEditionForm"><contents>By signing this document, you are agreeing to adhere to the stand fitting regulations and confirm that you will abide by all regulations and carry out best practice at {{Event_Edition__c}} to make it a sustainable exhibition.</contents></template><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3wbE-U-2593"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wbG8w-2604" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight" model="EventEditionForm"><contents><ul>
  <li>Staff will wear sufficient personal protective equipment (PPE) during build up and breakdown</li>
  <li>If complex fees are applicable payment will be made in advance by the Exhibitor before the stand is approved</li>
  <li>The stand will arrive prefabricated where possible and any machine based carpentry must be detailed in the method statement</li>
  <li>The stand will be removed from the Exhibition Hall before {{Event_Edition__c}}</li>
</ul>  
{{Stand_Removal_Date_Time__c}}</contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background"/><styleitem type="border" padding="left,"><styles><styleitem property="padding-left" (function(skuid){
 var $ = skuid.$;
 $(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
 	var eventDetailModel = skuid.model.getModel('EventDetail');
    var eventDetail = eventDetailModel.getFirstRow();
    var eventPaymentSchedule = eventDetail.Payment_Schedule__c;
    var cutOffDate =  eventDetail.X50_Cutoff_Date__c;
    var cutOffDate1 = eventDetail.Cutoff_Date_1__c;
    var cutOffDate2 = eventDetail.Cutoff_Date_2__c;
    var cutOffDate3 = eventDetail.CutoffDate_3__c;
    console.log(eventPaymentSchedule);
    
    var eventPaymentSchedule2 = eventPaymentSchedule.split('-');
    console.log('----'+eventPaymentSchedule2.length);
    var p1;
    var p2;
    var p3;
    var p4;
   for(var i=0;i<eventPaymentSchedule2.length;++i)
   {
       console.log(i+' : '+eventPaymentSchedule2[i]);
       if(i==0){
           p1 =eventPaymentSchedule2[i];
       }
       if(i==1){
           p2 =eventPaymentSchedule2[i];
       }
       if(i==2){
           p3 =eventPaymentSchedule2[i];
       }
       if(i==3){
           p4 =eventPaymentSchedule2[i];
       }
    }
    console.log(p1);
    console.log(p2);
    console.log(p3);
    var modelA = skuid.model.getModel('EventDetailTemp');
    var a= modelA.createRow({ 
                    additionalConditions: [
                        { field: 'CutoffDate', value: cutOffDate},
                        { field: 'CutoffDate1', value: cutOffDate1},
                        { field: 'CutoffDate2', value: cutOffDate2},
                        { field: 'CutoffDate3', value: cutOffDate3},
                        { field: 'PaymentSchedule1', value: p1},
                        { field: 'PaymentSchedule2', value: p2},
                        { field: 'PaymentSchedule3', value: p3},
                        { field: 'PaymentSchedule4', value: p4},
                    ],doAppend: true});
                    
    modelA.save();
 });
})(skuid);

</jsitem></javascript></resources></skuidpage>

id="Pending_Customer_Request"/><label id="Processed_Customer_Request"/></labels><javascript><jsitem location="inline" name="callAddValue" cachelocation="false" url="">/*
    ** Snippet to....
*/
function callAddVal(param)
{
    var div = document.getElementsByClassName('nx-richtext-input');
    
    div[0].focus() ; // DIV with cursor is 'myInstance1' (Editable DIV)
    var sel, range;
    var text =param; // Textarea containing the text to add to the myInstance1 DIV
    if (window.getSelection) {
        sel = window.getSelection();
        if (sel.getRangeAt && sel.rangeCount) 
        {
            range = sel.getRangeAt(0);
            range.deleteContents();

            var lines = text.replace("\r\n", "\n").split("\n");
            var frag = document.createDocumentFragment();
            for (var i = 0, len = lines.length; i < len; ++i) {
                if (i > 0) 
                {
                    frag.appendChild( document.createElement("br") );
                }
                frag.appendChild( document.createTextNode(lines[i]) );
            }
            range.insertNode(frag);
            div[0].focus() ;
           //$ = skuid.$;
           //alert(div[0].innerHTML);
        }
    } else if (document.selection && document.selection.createRange) {
        document.selection.createRange().text = text;
    }
}</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="updateContent" cachelocation="false">/*

//contextRow.HTML_Content = contextContent;


	console.log('contextId: '+contextId);
    console.log('contextContent: '+contextContent);
    console.log('contextRow: '+contextRow.HTML_Content);
    var inpObj = contextRow.HTML_Content;
    var scriptTagArray = ["<script>", "<\/script>", "<script type='text\/javascript'>","<\/script>"];
    for (i = 0; i < scriptTagArray.length; i++) { 
    	var isJScrpt= inpObj.indexOf(scriptTagArray[i]);
    	if(isJScrpt>-1)
    	{
    		alert('Please do not use script tag in side HTML Content');
    		return false;
    	}
    }
    var modelA = skuid.model.getModel('EEE_Template');
    modelA.updateRow(
        { Id: contextId },
        { Content__c:contextRow.HTML_Content  }
    );
    
    modelA.save();</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="popFields" cachelocation="false">/*

    ** Snippet to remove the hyperlink from the field
*/
var field = arguments[0],
value = arguments[1],
$ = skuid.$;	
    
//If we are in edit mode render the reference field as pick list    
    if(field.mode === 'edit') 
    {
// temporarily set to REFPICK so we get the stock reference picklist functionality
        field.options.type = 'REFPICK';
// render away 
        skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype][field.mode](field, value);
// set it back to custom
        field.options.type = 'CUSTOM';
    }

// If we're  in read mode, then remove hyperlink 
if (field.mode !== 'edit') 
{
   skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype][field.mode](field, value);
    var linkTag = $('a', field.element);
    if(linkTag.length)
    {
        var output = $('<div>');
        output.append(linkTag.html());
    }   
    linkTag.replaceWith(output);
}</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="TotalAllocatedBages" cachelocation="false">/*

</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="ckTextArea" cachelocation="false">SetupCKTextArea(
	arguments[0] //Field
	, arguments[1] //Value
);</jsitem><jsitem location="inline" name="SetupCKTextArea" cachelocation="false" url="">var $ = skuid.$;

window.CKSettings = {
    removePlugins: 'pagebreak,preview,print,save,selectall,showblocks,showborders,smiley,tab,clipboard,panelbutton,colorbutton,colordialog,templates,div,resize,elementspath,enterkey,entities,popup,filebrowser,find,flash,floatingspace,forms,htmlwriter,iframe,menubutton,language,magicline,newpage,pagebreak,selectall,subscript,superscript,showblocks,showborders,scayt,tab,tabletools,justify,bidi,font'
    ,removeButtons: 'Subscript,Superscript,Underline'
};

function SetupCKTextArea(field, value) {
    /* Create and grab DOM elements */        
    skuid.ui.fieldRenderers.TEXTAREA.edit(field, value);
    var uniqid = RandomID();
    field.element.attr('id', uniqid);
    setTimeout(function(){
        var element = $("#" + uniqid + ">div");
        element.html(element.text());
        var instance = CKEDITOR.replace(element[0], window.CKSettings);
        instance.on('change', function() {
            var fieldRow = field.row
                , fieldId = field.id
                , fieldText = this.getData()
                , fieldData = {};
            fieldData[fieldId] = fieldText;
            console.log(field);
            field.model.updateRow(fieldRow, fieldData, {initiatorId : field._GUID});
            
        });
    },100);
}
function RandomID() {
    var S4 = function() {
        return (((1+Math.random())*0x10000)|0).toString(16).substring(1);
    };
    return (S4()+S4()+"-"+S4()+"-"+S4()+"-"+S4()+"-"+S4()+S4()+S4());
}

        {

        }
        else
        {
            model = skuid.$M('ExpocadBooth');
            model.setCondition(model.getConditionByName('Id'),'');
            model.updateData();
        }
    }

</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="BoothInfo" cachelocation="false">/*
    Capturing booth information as per event edition as User ( shows as picklist on the badges registartion tab on customer center)
*/
var params = arguments[0], 
$ = skuid.$;
var currentUserModel = skuid.model.getModel('CurrentUser');
var CurrentUser = currentUserModel.getFirstRow();
var accountId= CurrentUser.AccountId;
var userName = CurrentUser.Name;
var eventDetailModel = skuid.model.getModel('EventDetail');
var eventDetail = eventDetailModel.getFirstRow();
var eventId= eventDetail.Id;
var result = sforce.apex.execute('oppAccountDetails','oppAccountDetails', {accountId:accountId, eventId:eventId});
var accDetails = JSON.parse(result);
var boothArr=[];
console.log('boothDetails: '+accDetails.boothDetails);
if(accDetails.boothDetails!==null)
{
    $.each(accDetails.boothDetails, function( index,value) {
        boothArr.push({value:value.boothId,label:userName +" - "+ value.boothName +" ("+value.boothArea +")"});
        //boothArr.push({value:value.boothId,label:userName +" - "+ value.boothName +" ("+value.boothArea +" "+value.unitType+")"});
        console.log('booth: '+value.boothName +' ('+value.boothArea +' '+value.unitType);
    });
    console.log('boothArr: '+boothArr);
}    
return boothArr;</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="SaveBoothId" cachelocation="false">/*

    console.log(result[0]);
    if(result[0]=="false")

        alert("Badges Limit reached...OR No Badges Limit defined..");
        return false;
    }

    	var modelA = skuid.model.getModel('EventDetail');

        var accId = rowCU.Contact.AccountId;
    	var modelB = skuid.model.getModel('AccountContactUI');
    	var modelBooth = skuid.model.getModel('ExpocadBoothUI');
    	
        var result = sforce.apex.execute('EventEditionAccountContact','EventEditionAccountContact', { eId:eId, accId: accId});
        console.log(result);
        var resultBooth = sforce.apex.execute('EventEditionAccountContact','EventEditionAccountEventBooth', { eId:eId, accId: accId});
        console.log(resultBooth);
    	var conList = JSON.parse(result);
    	console.log(conList);
    	var boothList = JSON.parse(resultBooth);
    	console.log(boothList);
    	//var rowsToInsert = {}
    	// Populating UI Model with data capture from salesforce for product
     	if(conList)
        {
            $.each(conList, function( index,value) {
            var contactList = modelB.createRow({ 
                    additionalConditions: [
                        { field: 'ContactId', value: value.ContactId},
                        { field: 'FirstName', value: value.FirstName},
                        { field: 'LastName', value: value.LastName},
                        { field: 'ContactType', value: value.ContactType},
                    ],doAppend: true});
            } );
            
            
            modelB.save();
        }
       
        modelB.save();
        
        if(boothList)
        {
            $.each(boothList, function( index,value) {
            var boothLists = modelBooth.createRow({

                        { field: 'BoothContactId', value: value.boothContactId},
                        { field: 'BoothContactName', value: value.boothContactName},
                    ],doAppend: true});
               
            } );
            modelBooth.save();
        }
        modelBooth.save();
	});
	
})(skuid);

window.CKSettings = {
    removePlugins: 'pagebreak,preview,print,save,selectall,showblocks,showborders,smiley,tab,clipboard,panelbutton,colorbutton,colordialog,templates,div,resize,elementspath,enterkey,entities,popup,filebrowser,find,flash,floatingspace,forms,htmlwriter,iframe,menubutton,language,magicline,newpage,pagebreak,selectall,subscript,superscript,showblocks,showborders,scayt,tab,tabletools,justify,bidi,font'
    ,removeButtons: 'Subscript,Superscript,Underline'
};

function SetupCKTextArea(field, value) {
    /* Create and grab DOM elements */        
    skuid.ui.fieldRenderers.TEXTAREA.edit(field, value);
    var uniqid = RandomID();
    field.element.attr('id', uniqid);
    setTimeout(function(){
        var element = $("#" + uniqid + ">div");
        element.html(element.text());
        var instance = CKEDITOR.replace(element[0], window.CKSettings);
        instance.on('change', function() {
            var fieldRow = field.row
                , fieldId = field.id
                , fieldText = this.getData()
                , fieldData = {};
            fieldData[fieldId] = fieldText;
            console.log(field);
            field.model.updateRow(fieldRow, fieldData, {initiatorId : field._GUID});
            
        });
    },500);
}
function RandomID() {
    var S4 = function() {
        return (((1+Math.random())*0x10000)|0).toString(16).substring(1);
    };
    return (S4()+S4()+"-"+S4()+"-"+S4()+"-"+S4()+"-"+S4()+S4()+S4());
}

</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="ckTextArea" cachelocation="false">SetupCKTextArea(
	arguments[0] //Field
	, arguments[1] //Value
);</jsitem><jsitem location="inline" name="SetupCKTextArea" cachelocation="false" url="">var $ = skuid.$;

window.CKSettings = {
    removePlugins: 'pagebreak,preview,print,save,selectall,showblocks,showborders,smiley,tab,clipboard,panelbutton,colorbutton,colordialog,templates,div,resize,elementspath,enterkey,entities,popup,filebrowser,find,flash,floatingspace,forms,htmlwriter,iframe,menubutton,language,magicline,newpage,pagebreak,selectall,subscript,superscript,showblocks,showborders,scayt,tab,tabletools,justify,bidi,font'
    ,removeButtons: 'Subscript,Superscript,Underline'
};

function SetupCKTextArea(field, value) {
    /* Create and grab DOM elements */        
    skuid.ui.fieldRenderers.TEXTAREA.edit(field, value);
    var uniqid = RandomID();
    field.element.attr('id', uniqid);
    setTimeout(function(){
        var element = $("#" + uniqid + ">div");
        element.html(element.text());
        var instance = CKEDITOR.replace(element[0], window.CKSettings);
        instance.on('change', function() {
            var fieldRow = field.row
                , fieldId = field.id
                , fieldText = this.getData()
                , fieldData = {};
            fieldData[fieldId] = fieldText;
            console.log(field);
            field.model.updateRow(fieldRow, fieldData, {initiatorId : field._GUID});
            
        });
    },500);
}
function RandomID() {
    var S4 = function() {
        return (((1+Math.random())*0x10000)|0).toString(16).substring(1);
    };
    return (S4()+S4()+"-"+S4()+"-"+S4()+"-"+S4()+"-"+S4()+S4()+S4());
}

   </jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="priorityOrder" cachelocation="false">/*
    ** Snippet to identify the priority level
*/
(function(skuid){
var $ = skuid.$;
$(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
var component = skuid.$C('sk-1ZF7zF-297'),
   listContents = component && component.element.find('.nx-list-contents');
listContents.sortable({
   placeholder: "ui-state-highlight",
   stop: function( event, ui ) {
       var data = ui.item.data('object'),
           model = data.list.model,
           movedRow = data.row,
           target = $(event.target);
       
       target.children().each(function(index,tr){
           var row =  $(tr).data('object').row,
               order = row.Priority__c;
          if (index + 1 !== order) {
              model.updateRow(row,'Priority__c',index+1,{initiatorId:component._GUID});
           }
       });
           
   }
});
});
})(skuid);

// render away 
        skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype][field.mode](field, value);
// set it back to custom
        field.options.type = 'CUSTOM';
    }

// If we're  in read mode, then remove hyperlink 
if (field.mode !== 'edit') 
{
   skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype][field.mode](field, value);
    var linkTag = $('a', field.element);
    if(linkTag.length)
    {
        var output = $('<div>');
        output.append(linkTag.html());
    }   
    linkTag.replaceWith(output);
}</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="ckTextArea" cachelocation="false">SetupCKTextArea(
	arguments[0] //Field
	, arguments[1] //Value
);</jsitem><jsitem location="inline" name="SetupCKTextArea" cachelocation="false" url="">var $ = skuid.$;

window.CKSettings = {
    removePlugins: 'pagebreak,preview,print,save,selectall,showblocks,showborders,smiley,tab,clipboard,panelbutton,colorbutton,colordialog,templates,div,resize,elementspath,enterkey,entities,popup,filebrowser,find,flash,floatingspace,forms,htmlwriter,iframe,menubutton,language,magicline,newpage,pagebreak,selectall,subscript,superscript,showblocks,showborders,scayt,tab,tabletools,justify,bidi,font'
    ,removeButtons: 'Subscript,Superscript,Underline'
};

function SetupCKTextArea(field, value) {
    /* Create and grab DOM elements */        
    skuid.ui.fieldRenderers.TEXTAREA.edit(field, value);
    var uniqid = RandomID();
    field.element.attr('id', uniqid);
    setTimeout(function(){
        var element = $("#" + uniqid + ">div");
        element.html(element.text());
        var instance = CKEDITOR.replace(element[0], window.CKSettings);
        instance.on('change', function() {
            var fieldRow = field.row
                , fieldId = field.id
                , fieldText = this.getData()
                , fieldData = {};
            fieldData[fieldId] = fieldText;
            console.log(field);
            field.model.updateRow(fieldRow, fieldData, {initiatorId : field._GUID});
            
        });
    },100);
}
function RandomID() {
    var S4 = function() {
        return (((1+Math.random())*0x10000)|0).toString(16).substring(1);
    };
    return (S4()+S4()+"-"+S4()+"-"+S4()+"-"+S4()+"-"+S4()+S4()+S4());
}

var ROW_ACTION_ICON = 'sk-icon-account-transfer';
var field = arguments[0],
    value = skuid.utils.decodeHTML(arguments[1]),
    $ = skuid.$;

skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype][field.mode](field,value);
// If we're NOT in edit mode, then have the "link" action show a popup
if (field.mode !== 'edit') {
    if (ROW_ACTION_ICON) {
        field.element.find('a').attr('href','#').on('click',function(){
            var closestTr = field.element.closest('tr');
            var tds = closestTr.children('td');
            var actionsCell;
            if (tds.length) {
                if (tds.first().find('input[type="checkbox"]').length) {
                    actionsCell = tds[1];
                } else {
                    actionsCell = tds[0];
                }
            }
            if (actionsCell) {
                var rowAction = $(actionsCell).find('.'+ROW_ACTION_ICON);
                if (rowAction) {
                    // Trigger the click action
                    rowAction.click();
                }
            }
        });
    }
}

</jsitem><jsitem location="inline" name="AccountDetails" cachelocation="false" url="">(function(skuid){
	var $ = skuid.$;
	$(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
		var currentUserModel = skuid.model.getModel('CurrentUser');
        var CurrentUser = currentUserModel.getFirstRow();
        var accountId= CurrentUser.AccountId;
    	
    	var eventDetailModel = skuid.model.getModel('EventDetails');
        var eventDetail = eventDetailModel.getFirstRow();
        var eventId= eventDetail.Id;
    	var result = sforce.apex.execute('oppAcountDetails','oppAcountDetails', {accountId:accountId, eventId:eventId});
    	var accDetails = JSON.parse(result);

		var modelAccount = skuid.model.getModel('AccountDetails');
		var values = '<br /> <b>Amount: </b>'+accDetails.amount+'<br /> <b> Remaining Amount:</b> '+accDetails.remainingAmount+'<br />';
		values = values +'<br /><table>';
	    values = values +'<tr>';
        values = values +'<th style="width:150px">Booth Name</th>';
        values = values +'<th style="width:150px">Booth Area</th></tr>';
  
		$.each(accDetails.boothDetails, function( index, value ) {
            values = values +'<tr><td>'+value.boothName+'</td>';  
            values = values +'<td>'+value.boothArea+' '+value.unitType+'</td></tr>';
            //console.log( index + " boothName : " + value.boothName +" boothArea :" +value.boothArea);
        });
        values = values +'</table>';
		$('#sk-2iONVz-794').append(values);
	});
})(skuid);</jsitem></javascript></resources><styles><styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/></styles></skuidpage>

var ROW_ACTION_ICON = 'sk-icon-account-transfer';
var field = arguments[0],
    value = skuid.utils.decodeHTML(arguments[1]),
    $ = skuid.$;

skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype][field.mode](field,value);
// If we're NOT in edit mode, then have the "link" action show a popup
if (field.mode !== 'edit') {
    if (ROW_ACTION_ICON) {
        field.element.find('a').attr('href','#').on('click',function(){
            var closestTr = field.element.closest('tr');
            var tds = closestTr.children('td');
            var actionsCell;
            if (tds.length) {
                if (tds.first().find('input[type="checkbox"]').length) {
                    actionsCell = tds[1];
                } else {
                    actionsCell = tds[0];
                }
            }
            if (actionsCell) {
                var rowAction = $(actionsCell).find('.'+ROW_ACTION_ICON);
                if (rowAction) {
                    // Trigger the click action
                    rowAction.click();
                }
            }
        });
    }
}

(function(skuid){
	var $ = skuid.$;
	$(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
		var userMappingModel = skuid.model.getModel('ComponenrUserTypeMapping');
		var userMapping = userMappingModel.getFirstRow();
        var userMappingShow= userMapping.Pop_Up_Greeting_Show__c;
		
		var eventSettingModel = skuid.model.getModel('EventSet');
		var eventSetting = eventSettingModel.getFirstRow();
        var Is_Show= eventSetting.Is_Pop_Up_Greeting__c;
		var greating= eventSetting.Pop_Up_Greeting__c;
		
		var modal = document.getElementById('myModal');
		var span = document.getElementsByClassName("grey-btn")[0];
		span.onclick = function() {modal.style.display = "none";}
		if(Is_Show!==true || userMappingShow!==true)
		{
		    modal.style.display = 'none';
	    }
	    else
	    {
	        var str = document.referrer.search( 'frontdoor.jsp' );
	        if(str > 0)
	        {
    	        modal.style.display = 'block';
	        }
	        else{
	        modal.style.display = 'none';
	        }
	    }
	});
})(skuid);
</script>

<style>
.modal {display: none; position: fixed; z-index: 1; padding-top: 100px; left: 0; top: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; overflow: auto; background-color: rgb(0,0,0); background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.4);}
.modal-content {position: relative; background-color: #fefefe; margin: auto; padding: 30px; border: 1px solid #888; max-width: 750px; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.2),0 6px 20px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.19); -webkit-animation-name: animatetop; -webkit-animation-duration: 0.4s; animation-name: animatetop; animation-duration: 0.4s}
.modal-header {background-color: #fff; color: #000; border-bottom: 3px solid #b7b7b7;}
.modal-body {padding: 7px 10px;}
.modal-header h2{font-weight: 700; font-size: 20px; padding-bottom: 18px;}
.modal-body > p{color: #7e7e7e; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400;}
.pull-right{float: right;}
.close {color: #000; float: right; font-size: 28px; font-weight: bold;}
.close:hover, .close:focus {color: #000; text-decoration: none; cursor: pointer;}
.grey-btn{background: #636363; color: #fff; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 600; border: none; cursor: pointer; padding: 5px 15px; margin-top: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px;}
.modal-footer {padding-top: 10px; border-top: 3px solid #b7b7b7;}
</style>

.cc-event-summary thead{
    background:#acacac;
    color:white;
}
.cc-event-summary table{
    border-spacing: 0px;
}

/*Exhibitor Action Items Flexbox Grid Styles*/
.nx-page .ui-widget .cc-exhibitor-flexbox-parent-active {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    width: 100%;
}
/* Allows one child to display at the correct width */
.nx-page .ui-widget .cc-exhibitor-flexbox-parent-active .sk-wrapper {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    width: 100%;
}
.nx-page .ui-widget .cc-exhibitor-flexbox-parent-inactive {
    display: flex;
    align-items: flex-start;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    height: 100%;
    width: 100%;
    opacity:.5;
}
/* Allows one child to display at the correct width */
.nx-page .ui-widget .cc-exhibitor-flexbox-parent-inactive .sk-wrapper {
    /*display: flex; /* comment By amish */
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    width: 100%;
}
/* Conditional borders for Odds/Even child flexbox divs */
.cc-exhibitor-flexbox-child:nth-child(odd) {
    width: 49%;
    float:left;
    border-bottom: dotted;
    border-right: dotted;
    border-width: 1px;
    padding-top: 15px;
    padding-bottom: 15px;
    flex: 0 0 auto;
}
.cc-exhibitor-flexbox-child:nth-child(even) {
    width: 49%;
    float:left;
    border-bottom: dotted;
    border-width: 1px;
    padding-top: 15px;
    padding-bottom: 15px;
    flex: 0 0 auto;
}
/* Conditional borders for Odds/Even child flexbox divs */
.cc-exhibitor-flexbox-child:empty {
    display: none;
}
/* Child Titles and Subtitle Content */
.cc-exhibitor-flexbox-child-content {
    font-size:14px;
    color:#A1A1A1;
    width:90%;
}
.cc-exhibitor-flexbox-child-content a i {
    font-size:8px;
}
.cc-exhibitor-flexbox-child-content strong {
    color:#000;
    font-size:16px;
    display: inline-block;
}
/* Main icon size for flex child grid */
.cc-exhibitor-icon-size {
    font-size:4em;
}
/*Notification red text*/
.cc-exhibitor-notification {
    color:red;
    font-size:12px;
    font-weight:bold;
    margin-top:10px;
    width:90%;
}
/*Hide Notification div if empty*/
.cc-exhibitor-notification:empty {
    display: none;
}
/*Float notification warning icon on top*/
.cc-exhibitor-notification-warning {
    font-size:2em;
    color:red;
    transform: translate(5px, 32px);
    position: absolute;
}
.cc-exhibitor-coming-soon-top {
    text-align: center;
    border-top: dotted;
    border-width: 1px;
    padding: 10px;
    width:95%; 
    transform: translate(0px, -1px);
}
.cc-exhibitor-coming-soon-bottom {
    border-bottom: dotted;
    text-align: center;
    border-width: 1px;
    padding-bottom: 10px;
    width: 103%;
    transform: translate(-11px, 0px);
}
.cc-exhibitor-coming-soon-bottom:empty {
    display: none;
}
/*Hide Deck Border*/
.sk-deck article {
    border:none;

})(skuid);</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="SkuidSample.CardView" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
function renderCard( item )
{
    var row = item.row,
        model = item.list.model;

    var isNew = skuid.model.isNewId( row.Id );

    // set the Item's mode to "edit" for new rows. This will cause the Item's
    // field's to be automatically rendered in edit mode.
    if ( isNew )
        item.mode = 'edit';

    // create a wrapper function to make creating fields a bit less verbose
    var createField =
        function( fieldId )
        {
            return createEditableField( fieldId, model, row, item );
        };

    // create the editable fields
    var fName = createField( 'Name' ),
        fCode = createField( 'ProductCode' ),
        fFamily = createField( 'Family' ),
        fDesc = createField( 'Description' );

    var card = item.element
        .addClass( 'customview-card' );

    // header
    var header = $( '<div>' )
        .addClass( 'customview-header' )
        .appendTo( card );

    // card delete button
    $('<div>')
        .addClass( 'ui-silk ui-silk-delete' )
        .addClass( 'customview-cardbutton' )
        .on( 'click', function() { item.toggleDelete( true ); })
        .appendTo( header );

    // card edit button
    $('<div>')
        .addClass( 'ui-silk ui-silk-pencil' )
        .addClass( 'customview-cardbutton' )
        .on( 'click', function() { item.toggleEdit(); })
        .appendTo( header );

    // product name
    fName.element
        .addClass( 'customview-content' )
        .appendTo( header );

    var content = $( '<div>' )
        .appendTo( card );

    // image
    $( '<img>' )
        .attr( 'src',
            row.Image__r ?
                skuid.utils.getUrlFromAttachmentId(
                    row.Image__r.skuid__AttachmentId__c ) :
                $( '#nx-images .default_org' ).text()
        )
        .appendTo(
            $( '<a>' )
                .addClass( 'customview-imageframe' )
                .appendTo( content )
                .attr( 'href', '/' + row.Id )

	var $ = skuid.$;
	$(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
		
		var menuItems = $('.cc-main-nav .sk-navigation-item.top-level'),
		    counter = 0;
		    
        // we need to run a check to look for our dom elements
        // once we find them, we remove the timer and run our function
		var checkDomTimer = setInterval(function(){
		    if(menuItems.length > 1) {
		        setSelectedNavItem();
		        clearInterval(checkDomTimer);
		    } else {
		        if(counter == 10) {
		            clearInterval(checkDomTimer);
		        }
		    }
		    counter++;
		}, 100);
		
		
		// **IMPORTANT**
		// This logic relies on icons that are set for each navigation item
		// and are hidden with css. If the icons change or are removed, this
		// WILL BREAK.

		    formsNavItem        = $('.cc-main-nav .sk-navigation-item.top-level:has(.fa-files-o)'),
		    manualsNavItem      = $('.cc-main-nav .sk-navigation-item.top-level:has(.fa-file-text-o)'),
		    profileNavItem      = $('.cc-main-nav .sk-navigation-item.top-level:has(.fa-file-archive-o)'),
		    uploadNavItem       = $('.cc-main-nav .sk-navigation-item.top-level:has(.fa-cloud-upload)'),
		    catalogNavItem      = $('.cc-main-nav .sk-navigation-item.top-level:has(.fa-barcode)'),
		    badgesNavItem       = $('.cc-main-nav .sk-navigation-item.top-level:has(.fa-ticket)');
		    
		
		function setSelectedNavItem() {
    		switch(skuid.page.name) {
    		    // HOME
    		    case "CustomerPortalHomePage":
    		        break;
    		    
    		    // FINANCIALS & BILLING
    		    case "AccountAndBilling":
    		        // set selected menu item
    		        financialsNavItem.addClass('cc-selected-item');
    		        break;
    		    
    		    // ORDER FORMS   
    		    case "CustomerFormList":
    		        // set selected menu item
    		        formsNavItem.addClass('cc-selected-item');
    		        break;
    		    
    		    // MANUALS
                case "CustomerManualList":
                    // set selected menu item
    		        manualsNavItem.addClass('cc-selected-item');
    		        break;
    		    
    		    // BOOTH PROFILE
                case "CustomerProfile":
    		        // set selected menu item
    		        profileNavItem.addClass('cc-selected-item');
    		        break;
    		    
    		    // DOCUMENT UPLOAD  
    		    case "CustomerUploadCenter":
    		        // set selected menu item
    		        uploadNavItem.addClass('cc-selected-item');
    		        break;
    		        
    		    // SPONSORSHIP GALLERY
    		    case "DisplayProductsOnCommunity":
    		        // set selected menu item
    		        catalogNavItem.addClass('cc-selected-item');
    		        break;

    		}

    var $ = skuid.$,
        hidePaginationAtRecords = 20,
        models = {};
    $(document.body).one('pageload', function () {
        setInterval(function () {
            var components = skuid.component.getByType('skootable');
            for (var i = 0; i < components.length; i++) {
                var component = components[i],
                    model = (component.list !== undefined) ? component.list.model : false;
                if (model) {
                    if (!models.hasOwnProperty(model.id)) {
                        models[model.id] = {
                            model: model,
                            recordCount: -1
                        };
                    }
                    if (model.data.length != models[model.id].recordCount) {
                        var currentViewCount = component.list.currentPageSize,
                            show = Boolean(Math.min(hidePaginationAtRecords, currentViewCount) < model.data.length || model.canRetrieveMoreRows);
                        console.log(show);
                        if(show) component.element.removeClass('cc-no-footer');
                        else component.element.addClass('cc-no-footer');
                    }
                }
            }
            for (var modelId in models) {
                if (models.hasOwnProperty(modelId)) {
                    models[modelId].recordCount = models[modelId].model.data.length;
                }
            }
        }, 1000);
    });
})(skuid);</jsitem><jsitem location="inline" name="cc-utility-nav-direction" cachelocation="false" url="">(function(skuid){

}
